title: Ruler tool
body:
This feature would add a ruler tool to the DOM Explorer which would be used to draw an arbitrary ruler on the page to measure the distance between two points.

Proposed Design
- New command on the DOM Explorer
- Only one ruler can be drawn on the page at a time
- Activating the command clears the previous ruler from the page and sets the mouse to draw mode where the first click places the first point and then draws a line to the current mouse pointer location. While moving the mouse cursor, a label should be drawn next to the cursor that indicates the x, y and angle (0' is vertically up) distance in pixels from the origin
- The ruler and text need a contrasting background
